languages.text: {n}Под низко надвинутым капюшоном практически невозможно рассмотреть лицо техножреца. Воздух {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}индустриального мира{/g} заполнен вонью гари и расплавленной пластали, однако вблизи вы отчетливо ощущаете источаемый человеком смрад — убийственную смесь технической смазки, застарелого пота и чего-то еще более отвратительного.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы делаете пару шагов к техножрецу, но не успеваете как следует разглядеть его вблизи: шаги заставляют служителя Культа вздрогнуть и обернуться.{/n}

languages.text: {n}It is practically impossible to make out the Tech-Priest's face with the hood pulled so low. The air on the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} is thick with the smell of fumes and molten plasteel, but standing close to the Tech-Priest, you can clearly smell the stench coming off him — a staggering mixture of machine lubricants, old sweat, and something even more revolting.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Под низко надвинутым капюшоном практически невозможно рассмотреть лицо техножреца. Воздух {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}индустриального мира{/g} заполнен вонью гари и расплавленной пластали, однако вблизи вы отчетливо ощущаете источаемый человеком смрад — убийственную смесь технической смазки, застарелого пота и чего-то еще более отвратительного.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}It is practically impossible to make out the Tech-Priest's face with the hood pulled so low. The air on the factory world is thick with the smell of fumes and molten plasteel, but standing close to the Tech-Priest, you can clearly sense the stench coming off him — a staggering mixture of machine lubricants, old sweat, and something even more disgusting.{/n}

The air on the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} is thick with the smell of fumes and molten plasteel, but standing close to the Tech-Priest, you can clearly smell the stench coming off him — a staggering mixture of machine lubricants, old sweat, and something even more revolting.{/n}

languages.text: {n}技术神甫的兜帽拉得很低，你几乎看不清他的脸。{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}工业世界{/g}的空气本该弥漫着浓厚的烟尘与熔化的塑钢味，但站在这位技术神甫身边时，你却清楚地闻到了他身上散发出来的臭味。那是机器的润滑油、陈年老汗，以及更加令人作呕的东西混合在一起散发的味道。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is practically impossible to make out the Tech-Priest's face with the hood pulled so low. The air on the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} is thick with the smell of fumes and molten plasteel, but standing close to the Tech-Priest, you can clearly smell the stench coming off him — a staggering mixture of machine lubricants, old sweat, and something even more revolting.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}技术祭司的兜帽拉得很低，你几乎看不清他的脸。{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}工业世界{/g}的空气本该弥漫着浓厚的烟尘与熔化的塑钢味，但站在这位技术祭司身边时，你却清楚地闻到了他身上散发出来的臭味。那是机器的润滑油、陈年老汗，以及更加令人作呕的东西混合在一起散发的味道。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es prácticamente imposible distinguir la cara del tecnosacerdote por lo baja que tiene la capucha. El aire del {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}mundo industrial{/g} está lleno de vapores de plastiacero derretido, pero a esta distancia del tecnosacerdote puedes notar la peste que emana de él. Es una mezcla de lubricantes para máquinas, sudor reseco y algo aún más repulsivo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is practically impossible to make out the Tech-Priest's face with the hood pulled so low. The air on the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} is thick with the smell of fumes and molten plasteel, but standing close to the Tech-Priest, you can clearly smell the stench coming off him — a staggering mixture of machine lubricants, old sweat, and something even more revolting.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es prácticamente imposible distinguir la cara del tecnosacerdote por lo baja que tiene la capucha. El aire del {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}mundo industrial{/g} está lleno de vapores de plastiacero derretido, pero a esta distancia del tecnosacerdote puedes notar la peste que emana de él. Es una mezcla de lubricantes para máquinas, sudor reseco y algo aún más repulsivo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}これほどフードを深く被っていては、技術司祭の顔を判別するのは不可能だ。{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}産業惑星{/g}の空気は、ガスと溶けたプラスチールの匂いでむわっとしているが、技術司祭の近くに立つと、司祭から漂う強烈な臭いがハッキリと鼻に届く…機械の潤滑油、古くなった汗、そしてもっと不快感のある何かが混ざったギョッとする異臭だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is practically impossible to make out the Tech-Priest's face with the hood pulled so low. The air on the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} is thick with the smell of fumes and molten plasteel, but standing close to the Tech-Priest, you can clearly smell the stench coming off him — a staggering mixture of machine lubricants, old sweat, and something even more revolting.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}これほどフードを深く被っていては、技術司祭の顔を判別するのは不可能だ。{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}産業惑星{/g}の空気は、ガスと溶けたプラスチールの匂いでむわっとしているが、技術司祭の近くに立つと、司祭から漂う強烈な臭いがハッキリと鼻に届く…機械の潤滑油、古くなった汗、そしてもっと不快感のある何かが混ざったギョッとする異臭だ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es ist praktisch unmöglich, dass Gesicht des Techpriester zu erkennen, weil die Kapuze so weit heruntergezogen ist. Die Luft der {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}Produktionswelt{/g} ist angefüllt von Dämpfen und geschmolzenem Plaststahl, aber neben dem Techpriester riechst du deutlich den Gestank, der von ihm ausgeht – eine betäubende Mischung aus Maschinenschmiermittel, altem Schweiß und etwas noch Ekelhafterem.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is practically impossible to make out the Tech-Priest's face with the hood pulled so low. The air on the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} is thick with the smell of fumes and molten plasteel, but standing close to the Tech-Priest, you can clearly smell the stench coming off him — a staggering mixture of machine lubricants, old sweat, and something even more revolting.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es ist praktisch unmöglich, dass Gesicht des Techpriester zu erkennen, weil die Kapuze so weit heruntergezogen ist. Die Luft der {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}Produktionswelt{/g} ist angefüllt von Dämpfen und geschmolzenem Plaststahl, aber neben dem Techpriester riechst du deutlich den Gestank, der von ihm ausgeht – eine betäubende Mischung aus Maschinenschmiermittel, altem Schweiß und etwas noch Ekelhafterem.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La capuche du technoprêtre est rabattue si bas qu'il est impossible de distinguer son visage. L'air du {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}monde industriel{/g} est saturé d'odeurs de fumée et de plastacier en fusion, mais une puanteur toute particulière se dégage du technoprêtre... celle d'un mélange écœurant de lubrifiant pour machine, de vieille sueur et de quelque chose d'encore plus abject.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is practically impossible to make out the Tech-Priest's face with the hood pulled so low. The air on the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} is thick with the smell of fumes and molten plasteel, but standing close to the Tech-Priest, you can clearly smell the stench coming off him — a staggering mixture of machine lubricants, old sweat, and something even more revolting.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La capuche du technoprêtre est rabattue si bas qu'il est impossible de distinguer son visage. L'air du {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}monde industriel{/g} est saturé d'odeurs de fumée et de plastacier en fusion, mais une puanteur toute particulière se dégage du technoprêtre... celle d'un mélange écœurant de lubrifiant pour machine, de vieille sueur et de quelque chose d'encore plus abject.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kapüşonu bu kadar çekiliyken Tekno Rahip'in yüzünü fark etmek neredeyse imkânsız. {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}Sınai dünyadaki{/g} hava, duman ve erimiş plasçelik kokusuyla dolu olsa da Tekno Rahip'in yanındayken pis kokunun ondan geldiğini anlayabiliyorsun. Makine yağı, kurumuş ter ve daha da tiksindirici bir şeyin kokusu karışıp üzerine sinmiş.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is practically impossible to make out the Tech-Priest's face with the hood pulled so low. The air on the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} is thick with the smell of fumes and molten plasteel, but standing close to the Tech-Priest, you can clearly smell the stench coming off him — a staggering mixture of machine lubricants, old sweat, and something even more revolting.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kapüşonu bu kadar çekiliyken Tekno Rahip'in yüzünü fark etmek neredeyse imkânsız. {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}Sınai dünya{/g}daki hava, duman ve erimiş plasçelik kokusuyla dolu olsa da Tekno Rahip'in yanındayken pis kokunun ondan geldiğini anlayabiliyorsun. Makine yağı, kurumuş ter ve daha da tiksindirici bir şeyin kokusu karışıp üzerine sinmiş.{/n}
